content:
Hi everyone,

Weâ€™re excited to share that KU Leuvenâ€™s review dashboard made by our colleague Ozgur Karadeniz, which tracks Dataset reviews and semi-automates feedback generation is now available in open-source for you to use: https://github.com/libis/rdm-review-dashboard

If you donâ€™t know what this dashboard is, you can view this one-minute screen-recording I made of our pilot environment to get a better idea: https://kuleuven.mediaspace.kaltura.com/media/KU+Leuven+Review+DashboardA+screen+recording/1_fuuts6ic Â 

If you want to know more about the dashboard, you can always contact us at rdr@kuleuven.be or by responding to this post. If youâ€™re encountering issues with the code, feel free to add an issue in the GitHub repository.

Kind regards,

Dieuwertje & Ozgur

Wow, the video is great. I added it to DataverseTV: https://dataverse.org/dataversetv

I also mentioned the new review dashboard in the news yesterday: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/w1mmRHGSY74/m/9H3hOoPOAQAJ
